nodes.text: Sugar was a sweetener added to coffeine, caf and many desserts.[source?] The most common types were brown and white sugar. Sugar could also be made into cubes. Yyeger sugar was one of the sweetest and most sought-after sugars in the galaxy. High contents of sugar could also preserve food like uj cake for years. The Zelosians reacted to sugar in much the same way that Humans reacted to alcohol.
